item.title: Adding buy x option
item.dc:creator: @Nubz Nubz
item.description:
@Nubz wrote:

Well I’m using Kihomura’s base here’s his ipban.
I’m not sure if it works I’m going to have to make one.

if (cmd.startsWith("ipban")) { try { int pid = Integer.parseInt(cmd.substring((cmd.indexOf(" ") + 1))); Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[pid]; if (pid < 1) { c.msgSend("Invalid player ID."); return; } if (p.disconnected) { c.msgSend("Player is not online"); return; } if (p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURUSERNAME")) { c.msgSend("You cannot IP-ban this user; they have been alerted of your actions."); p.msgSend(c.playerName +" has attempted to IP-ban you from the server.."); return; } else { c.msgSend("Player successfully IP-banned."); c.writeLog(p.connectedFrom, "IPBanned"); p.disconnected = true; } } catch (Exception e) { c.msgSend("Error IP-banning user."); e.printStackTrace(); } }

Read full topic
